messages.title: We want to hear from you
messages.content: Count me in, I'm voting Labour. Please send me a Vote Labour poster. I'd like to get involved with Peter Chowney's campaign.

leaflet.personalStatement: "I love Hastings & Rye, it's my adopted home. I'd welcome the opportunity to represent the constituency as your MP, to deal with our problems and promote our qualities."

contactInformation.address: 84 Bohemia Road St Leonards-on-Sea East Sussex TN37 6RN

images.caption: Elect Peter Chowney Labour candidate for Hastings & Rye
